data.title: We're All Gonna Die
data.meta_description: Jay Baruchel meets his fascination with the apocalypse head-on, as he explores, from a place of genuine curiosity and wonder, various ways humanity coâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Asteroid Armageddon

Could an asteroid destroy the world? Jay meets with experts including the Planetary Defence Officer at NASA to find out if weâre all gonna die.

26 min Â· Apr 30, 2022 TV-14

EPISODE 2

Nuclear Catastrophe

Jay learns that the nuclear apocalypse is far from just a relic of the Cold War. In fact, the threat is more real than ever.

26 min Â· May 2, 2022 TV-14

EPISODE 3

Pandemic Pandemonium

In the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic, Jay must deal with the existential threat of the disease while considering the added danger of human-made viruses.

26 min Â· May 2, 2022 TV-14

EPISODE 4

Alien Invasion

Jay believes that life exists elsewhere in the universe and that at the very least, aliens are observing Earth.

26 min Â· May 9, 2022 TV-14

EPISODE 5

Volcanic Cataclysm

Jay learns about a threat; supervolcanoes are often overlooked, but when they erupt they will change the Earth's climate.

26 min Â· May 9, 2022 TV-14
